concept.definition: Retired persons have all copays and deductibles reduced.
Children in the foster care have all copays and deductibles waived.

description: This value set includes Example Coverage Financial Exception Codes.
name: ExampleCoverageFinancialExceptionCodes

text.div:
Example Coverage Financial Exception Codes

This value set includes Example Coverage Financial Exception Codes.

Copyright Statement:

This is an example set.

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/ex-coverage-financial-exception defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
retired RetiredRetired persons have all copays and deductibles reduced.
foster Foster childChildren in the foster care have all copays and deductibles waived.

title: Example Coverage Financial Exception Codes
